alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Effingham; Inland Bryan (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, BULLOCH AND EFFINGHAM COUNTIES... At 544 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nevils to near Lanier, and moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Springfield, Pembroke, Lanier, Rincon, Guyton, Brooklet, Ebenezer, and Egypt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
